meanings.definition: A type of bird with a distinctive crest and curved bill.
meanings.sent1: The colorful cockatoos chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of cockatoos flying overhead.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cockatoos played a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The cockatoos' bright feathers were like a rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beauty of the cockatoos.
